about_the_game:
Mythos Party is in Early Alpha, so you may experience bugs and unfinished features as it is still a work in progress.

MYTHOS PARTY is a brawler party game set in a light-hearted mythological universe. Armed with various powers and weapons, hack, slash, punch and slap your opponents for the glory of the gods and be rewarded with their divine power!



BECOME A CHAMPION of the Gods in Mythos Party, eliminating enough opponents will allow you to transform into your paragon form, enabling you to unleash destructive power. Each paragon is equipped with a unique set of abilities that can bend the arena to your will.

CHANGE THE ARENA, tile-able destruction allows you to change the shape of the arena, giving you more opportunities to eliminate your opponents. Make sure to take full advantage of the missing tiles while they're gone as they will respawn.



KNOCK OUT YOUR OPPONENTS with a selection of different weaponry, each with unique attack combos and fighting styles.

TRIBUTES FROM THE GODS, between rounds you will be able to choose a tribute to add to your arsenal. These tributes are divine abilities that can assist with eliminating opponents - thus increasing your likelihood of victory.

STAND OUT FROM THE CROWD with the ability to customize your champion, mix and match different outfits and coloration to become a unique individual in the arena.



HONE YOUR SKILLS in the training arena where you can spend an unlimited amount of time practicing and preparing. The training arena gives you full access to all paragons/weapons/abilities and exploration of the different maps. You can also test your combat prowess against AI bot opponents with the easy drag and drop system.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: FX6300
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: Hack, slash, punch and slap your opponents for the glory of the gods and be rewarded with their divine power! Become a champion in Mythos Party, a free-to-play brawling party game set in a light-hearted mythological universe for up to 8 opponents.
